body_html: @aizvorski Here's the commit that turned the depthwise conv native: 975094c. You should be able to do an analogous thing to the 2D case to make a non-native depthwise conv for 3D, and then a separable conv is just depthwise followed by normal conv.
body_text: @aizvorski Here's the commit that turned the depthwise conv native: 975094c.  You should be able to do an analogous thing to the 2D case to make a non-native depthwise conv for 3D, and then a separable conv is just depthwise followed by normal conv.
body: @aizvorski Here's the commit that turned the depthwise conv native: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/975094c8382ee15dad434278804cb096f9bac84f.  You should be able to do an analogous thing to the 2D case to make a non-native depthwise conv for 3D, and then a separable conv is just depthwise followed by normal conv.
